original: Anden, Ignar, fabrikör, Fritsla, f. 30/3/97 i Borås av reg:läk. Lennart A. o. Ingeborg Wingqvist. G. 38 m. Solveig Michel. Barn: Jarl f. 40, Bo 42, Yvonne 45. — Stud:ex. i Borås 15, Gbgs hand:inst. 15-16, John Len-nings vävsk. 16-17, språkstud. i Engl. o. Franikr. Ägare t. firma L. J. Wingqvist, bomulls- o. ylleväverier o. spinnerier, Fritsla, sed. 09, chef f. firman sed. 18. Resor t. Tyskl., Engl. o. Frankr. årl. 20-39, jorden runt 32, t. Ind. 34, Egypt. 35 o. 38, delt. i inter-nat. bomulls ko ngr. Medl; av The Royal Bachel.or’s Club o. KAK. Hob-bies: fotografering o. filmning.
translated: Anden, Ignar, manufacturer, Fritsla, b. 30/3/97 in Borås to reg. doctor Lennart A. and Ingeborg Wingqvist. Married in 1938 to Solveig Michel. Children: Jarl b. 1940, Bo b. 1942, Yvonne b. 1945. — Graduated from Borås high school in 1915, attended Gothenburg Business Institute in 1915-16, John Lenning's weaving school in 1916-17, language studies in England and France. Owner of L. J. Wingqvist, a cotton and wool weaving and spinning company, in Fritsla since 1909 and has been the director since 1918. Has traveled to Germany, England, and France annually from 1920-1939, around the world in 1932, to India in 1934, and Egypt in 1935 and 1938. Participated in international cotton congresses. Member of The Royal Bachelor's Club and KAK. Hobbies include photography and filming.

worksFor.name: L. J. Wingqvist
worksFor.description: Cotton and wool weaving and spinning company
